info.task: navigate backwards to collapsed disclosure button
info.title: Navigate backwards to a collapsed disclosure button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToSecondDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on the second disclosure button in the navigation region
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the second disclosure button in the navigation region
testPageDocument.querySelector('button[aria-controls="id_admissions_menu"]').focus();

user: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the navigation region. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first disclosure button in the navigation region. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: State of the button (collapsed) is conveyed
